suppress.notes: file name: System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.dll Suppress false positive as this CVE is for Drupal.

file name: System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions.dll CVE references "Tasks" application version before 9.7.3 is affected by insecure permissions. The VoiceCommandActivity... This is a false positive from a Tasks mobile application against the System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions.dll assembly
